meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Nissley Judy Arnold Jonathan Corbblah Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6042.

div.div:
Tom Nissley game 1.
Alex announces The IBM Challenge.

td.p: Tom Nissley, an online books editor from Seattle, Washington
Judy Arnold, a technical writer from Sunnyvale, California
Jonathan Corbblah, a chess teacher from Harlem, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,000)

tr.td: LANGUAGES
CELEBRITY BOOKS
IT RINGS A BELL
THE FLU FIGHTERS
I'M DRIVING
THE STATE NAME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Yupik is a native language spoken by about 15,000 in Siberia & the western part of this state')

tr.td: Yupik is a native language spoken by about 15,000 in Siberia & the western part of this state

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_4', 'clue_J_6_4_stuck', '(Jonathan: What is Arkansas?)
(Judy: [No response])
(Alex: Oh, you\'re drawing a blank at the wrong time.)
(Judy: [*]?)
(Alex: Too late, too late. Sorry. Time ran out. Back to Jonathan.)

Kentucky

JonathanJudy
Triple Stumper
')

(Alex: Front of the--)

the front of the head

JonathanJudy
')
